request.description:
Api to send renewals quotations to facile.

It can work without any parameters ( gets all not cashed renewal titoli with data inizio equal to todays + 30 days ) or with "date" parameter ( gets all not cashed renewal titoli with data inizio equal to that date ) or with "nr_polizza" ( gets only the last uncashed titolo for this specific policy ).
